body: Sorry　for a lot of question. I could input other data into Psych Chart component. But I have One question. Indoors,Climate Consultant say that Rad temperature is same of dry bulb temperatuere. So I insert Dry bulb temperature to Mean Rad Temperature of Psych Chart component. But it does not work. Can I input one data number  to Mean Rad Temperature of Psych Chart component? What should I do? Best regard. Hiro [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pgHCO1djFo6us4L-O66T*iKQXvvv4GymfbbAhlKTS64KDGp8U4a2iUwCEZoSktopjslcUmHsrGdrY9NBq4BISMUlv4HiB*L5/file.JPG)
